meanings.definition: In need of sleep or rest
meanings.sent1: After playing outside all day, the kids were tired and ready for bed.
meanings.sent2: She felt tired after staying up late studying for her exam.
meanings.sent3: The tired puppy yawned and curled up for a nap.
meanings.sent4: The tired old tree sagged under the weight of the snow.
meanings.sent5: His tired eyes struggled to stay open as he fought off sleep.

meanings.definition: Bored or fed up with something
meanings.sent1: The students grew tired of the same math problems every day.
meanings.sent2: She became tired of watching reruns on TV and decided to go for a walk.
meanings.sent3: The tired cat ignored its toy and instead batted at a loose string.
meanings.sent4: The tired clock on the wall seemed to tick slower and slower.
meanings.sent5: His tired expression showed he had lost interest in the conversation.

meanings.definition: Showing the effects of hard work or strain
meanings.sent1: The tired farmer wiped his brow after a long day in the fields.
meanings.sent2: Her tired muscles ached from the intense workout at the gym.
meanings.sent3: The tired engine sputtered and coughed before finally starting.
meanings.sent4: The tired bridge creaked under the weight of the heavy trucks.
meanings.sent5: His tired hands trembled as he tried to lift the heavy box.
